shortdesc: Good knowledge of SharePoint 2007, 2010 ,2013 and SharePoint 2016 will be added advantage.
Experience in C#, ASP.NET MVC, Web API, Entity Framework or similar ORM, MVVM. Good understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery.
Should have hands-on experience in JSP, Servlet, JSTL, JDBC and HTML. Should have knowledge in struts and MVC frameworks. Should have strong OOPs knowledge
We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and build the next generation of our mobile applications.
